verses.verse: ( The Parable of the Sower) ( ( 480 4:1-9 ; 490 8:4-8 )) Ἐν <WG1722> En - τῇ <WG3588> tē [same] ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera day ἐκείνῃ <WG1565> ekeinē That ἐξελθὼν <WG1831> exelthōn went out ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the οἰκίας <WG3614> oikias house ἐκάθητο <WG2521> ekathēto [and] sat παρὰ <WG3844> para by τὴν <WG3588> tēn the θάλασσαν <WG2281> thalassan sea .

καὶ <WG2532> kai [Such] συνήχθησαν <WG4863> synēchthēsan gathered πρὸς <WG4314> pros around αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him ὄχλοι <WG3793> ochloi crowds πολλοί <WG4183> polloi large ὥστε <WG5620> hōste that αὐτὸν <WG846> auton He εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . πλοῖον <WG4143> ploion a boat ἐμβάντα <WG1684> embanta got into καθῆσθαι <WG2521> kathēsthai [and] sat down , καὶ <WG2532> kai while πᾶς <WG3956> pas all ὁ <WG3588> ho the ὄχλος <WG3793> ochlos people ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τὸν <WG3588> ton the αἰγιαλὸν <WG123> aigialon shore . εἱστήκει <WG2476> heistēkei stood

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And ἐλάλησεν <WG2980> elalēsen He told αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them πολλὰ <WG4183> polla many things ἐν <WG1722> en in παραβολαῖς <WG3850> parabolais parables , λέγων <WG3004> legōn saying , Ἰδοὺ <WG2400> Idou - ἐξῆλθεν <WG1831> exēlthen went out ὁ <WG3588> ho vvv σπείρων <WG4687> speirōn “ A farmer τοῦ <WG3588> tou - σπείρειν <WG4687> speirein to sow his seed .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐν <WG1722> en as τῷ <WG3588> tō - σπείρειν <WG4687> speirein sowing , αὐτὸν <WG846> auton he was ἃ <WG3739> ha some [seed] μὲν <WG3303> men - ἔπεσεν <WG4098> epesen fell παρὰ <WG3844> para along τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ὁδόν <WG3598> hodon path , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐλθόντα <WG2064> elthonta came τὰ <WG3588> ta the πετεινὰ <WG4071> peteina birds κατέφαγεν <WG2719> katephagen [and] devoured αὐτά <WG846> auta it .

Ἄλλα <WG243> Alla Some δὲ <WG1161> de - ἔπεσεν <WG4098> epesen fell ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τὰ <WG3588> ta - πετρώδη <WG4075> petrōdē rocky ground , ὅπου <WG3699> hopou where οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv εἶχεν <WG2192> eichen it did not have γῆν <WG1093> gēn soil . πολλήν <WG4183> pollēn much καὶ <WG2532> kai - εὐθέως <WG2112> eutheōs quickly ἐξανέτειλεν <WG1816> exaneteilen It sprang up διὰ <WG1223> dia because τὸ <WG3588> to - μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ἔχειν <WG2192> echein was βάθος <WG899> bathos shallow . γῆς <WG1093> gēs the soil

ἡλίου <WG2246> hēliou [when the] sun δὲ <WG1161> de But ἀνατείλαντος <WG393> anateilantos rose , ἐκαυματίσθη <WG2739> ekaumatisthē [the seedlings] were scorched , καὶ <WG2532> kai and διὰ <WG1223> dia because τὸ <WG3588> to - μὴ <WG3361> mē no ἔχειν <WG2192> echein they had ῥίζαν <WG4491> rhizan root . ἐξηράνθη <WG3583> exēranthē they withered

Ἄλλα <WG243> Alla Other [seed] δὲ <WG1161> de - ἔπεσεν <WG4098> epesen fell ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi among τὰς <WG3588> tas - ἀκάνθας <WG173> akanthas thorns , καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv ἀνέβησαν <WG305> anebēsan grew up αἱ <WG3588> hai vvv ἄκανθαι <WG173> akanthai [which] καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔπνιξαν* <WG4155> epnixan choked αὐτά <WG846> auta [the seedlings] .

Ἄλλα <WG243> Alla other [seed] δὲ <WG1161> de Still ἔπεσεν <WG4098> epesen fell ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τὴν <WG3588> tēn - γῆν <WG1093> gēn soil τὴν <WG3588> tēn - καλὴν <WG2570> kalēn good καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐδίδου <WG1325> edidou produced καρπόν <WG2590> karpon a crop — ὃ <WG3739> ho - μὲν <WG3303> men - ἑκατὸν <WG1540> hekaton a hundredfold , ὃ <WG3739> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - ἑξήκοντα <WG1835> hexēkonta sixtyfold , ὃ <WG3739> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de [or] τριάκοντα <WG5144> triakonta thirtyfold .
Ὁ <WG3588> Ho He who ἔχων <WG2192> echōn has ὦτα <WG3775> ōta ears , ( BYZ and TR ears to hear; also in verse 43) ἀκουέτω <WG191> akouetō let him hear . ”

( The Purpose of Jesus’ Parables) ( ( 290 6:1-13 ; 480 4:10-12 ; 490 8:9-10 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then προσελθόντες <WG4334> proselthontes came to [Jesus] οἱ <WG3588> hoi the μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples εἶπαν <WG2036> eipan [and] asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , Διὰ <WG1223> Dia “ Why τί <WG5101> ti . . . ἐν <WG1722> en in παραβολαῖς <WG3850> parabolais parables ? ” λαλεῖς <WG2980> laleis do You speak αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to [the people]

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - ἀποκριθεὶς <WG611> apokritheis He replied εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . ‹αὐτοῖς› <WG846> autois . . . , Ὅτι <WG3754> Hoti - Ὑμῖν <WG4771> Hymin to you , δέδοται <WG1325> dedotai has been given γνῶναι <WG1097> gnōnai “ The knowledge τὰ <WG3588> ta of the μυστήρια <WG3466> mystēria mysteries τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the βασιλείας <WG932> basileias kingdom τῶν <WG3588> tōn of οὐρανῶν <WG3772> ouranōn heaven ἐκείνοις <WG1565> ekeinois to them δὲ <WG1161> de but οὐ <WG3756> ou not δέδοται <WG1325> dedotai - .

ὅστις <WG3748> hostis Whoever γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ἔχει <WG2192> echei has δοθήσεται <WG1325> dothēsetai will be given [more] , αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - καὶ <WG2532> kai and περισσευθήσεται <WG4052> perisseuthēsetai he will have an abundance . ὅστις <WG3748> hostis Whoever δὲ <WG1161> de - οὐκ <WG3756> ouk [does] not ἔχει <WG2192> echei have , καὶ <WG2532> kai even ὃ <WG3739> ho what ἔχει <WG2192> echei he has ἀρθήσεται <WG142> arthēsetai will be taken away ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ from αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou him .

διὰ <WG1223> dia is why τοῦτο <WG3778> touto This ἐν <WG1722> en in παραβολαῖς <WG3850> parabolais parables : αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them λαλῶ <WG2980> lalō I speak Ὅτι <WG3754> Hoti ‘ Though βλέποντες <WG991> blepontes seeing , οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv βλέπουσιν <WG991> blepousin they do not see ; Καὶ <WG2532> Kai [though] ἀκούοντες <WG191> akouontes hearing , οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἀκούουσιν <WG191> akouousin they do not hear οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude [or] συνίουσιν <WG4920> syniousin understand . ’ ( See , , , and .)

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἀναπληροῦται <WG378> anaplēroutai is fulfilled αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois In them ἡ <WG3588> hē the προφητεία <WG4394> prophēteia prophecy Ἠσαΐου <WG2268> Ēsaiou of Isaiah ἡ <WG3588> hē - λέγουσα <WG3004> legousa - : Ἀκοῇ <WG189> Akoē . . . ἀκούσετε <WG191> akousete ‘ You will be ever hearing καὶ <WG2532> kai but οὐ <WG3756> ou never μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . συνῆτε <WG4920> synēte understanding ; Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - βλέποντες <WG991> blepontes . . . βλέψετε <WG991> blepsete you will be ever seeing καὶ <WG2532> kai but οὐ <WG3756> ou never μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ἴδητε <WG3708> idēte perceiving .

Ἐπαχύνθη <WG3975> Epachynthē has grown callous ; γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἡ <WG3588> hē - καρδία <WG2588> kardia heart τοῦ <WG3588> tou - λαοῦ <WG2992> laou people’s τούτου <WG3778> toutou this Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - τοῖς <WG3588> tois with [their] ὠσὶν <WG3775> ōsin ears , βαρέως <WG917> bareōs . . . ἤκουσαν <WG191> ēkousan they hardly hear Καὶ <WG2532> Kai and τοὺς <WG3588> tous - ὀφθαλμοὺς <WG3788> ophthalmous eyes . αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their ἐκάμμυσαν <WG2576> ekammysan they have closed Μή‿ <WG3361> Mē Otherwise ποτε <WG4219> pote . . . ἴδωσιν <WG3708> idōsin they might see τοῖς <WG3588> tois with [their] ὀφθαλμοῖς <WG3788> ophthalmois eyes , Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - τοῖς <WG3588> tois with [their] ὠσὶν <WG3775> ōsin ears , ἀκούσωσιν <WG191> akousōsin hear Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - τῇ <WG3588> tē with [their] καρδίᾳ <WG2588> kardia hearts , συνῶσιν <WG4920> synōsin understand Καὶ <WG2532> Kai and ἐπιστρέψωσιν <WG1994> epistrepsōsin turn , Καὶ <WG2532> Kai and ἰάσομαι <WG2390> iasomai I would heal αὐτούς <WG846> autous them .’ ( (see also LXX))

Ὑμῶν <WG4771> Hymōn your δὲ <WG1161> de But μακάριοι <WG3107> makarioi blessed [are] οἱ <WG3588> hoi - ὀφθαλμοὶ <WG3788> ophthalmoi eyes ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because βλέπουσιν <WG991> blepousin they see , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta - ὦτα <WG3775> ōta ears ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἀκούουσιν <WG191> akouousin they hear .

ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn truly γὰρ <WG1063> gar For λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - πολλοὶ <WG4183> polloi many προφῆται <WG4396> prophētai prophets καὶ <WG2532> kai and δίκαιοι <WG1342> dikaioi righteous [men] ἐπεθύμησαν <WG1937> epethymēsan longed ἰδεῖν <WG3708> idein to see ἃ <WG3739> ha what βλέπετε <WG991> blepete you see καὶ <WG2532> kai [but] οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv εἶδαν <WG3708> eidan did not see [it] , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀκοῦσαι <WG191> akousai to hear ἃ <WG3739> ha what ἀκούετε <WG191> akouete you hear καὶ <WG2532> kai [but] οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἤκουσαν <WG191> ēkousan did not hear [it] .

( The Parable of the Sower Explained) ( ( 480 4:13-20 ; 490 8:11-15 )) Ὑμεῖς <WG4771> Hymeis vvv οὖν <WG3767> oun then , ἀκούσατε <WG191> akousate Consider , τὴν <WG3588> tēn the παραβολὴν <WG3850> parabolēn parable τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the σπείραντος <WG4687> speirantos sower :

Παντὸς <WG3956> Pantos When anyone ἀκούοντος <WG191> akouontos hears τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon message τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the βασιλείας <WG932> basileias kingdom καὶ <WG2532> kai but μὴ <WG3361> mē does not συνιέντος <WG4920> synientos understand [it] , ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai comes ὁ <WG3588> ho the πονηρὸς <WG4190> ponēros evil one καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἁρπάζει <WG726> harpazei snatches away τὸ <WG3588> to what ἐσπαρμένον <WG4687> esparmenon was sown ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - καρδίᾳ <WG2588> kardia heart . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his οὗτός <WG3778> houtos This ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ὁ <WG3588> ho the [seed] παρὰ <WG3844> para along τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ὁδὸν <WG3598> hodon path . σπαρείς <WG4687> spareis sown ( Literally the one sown; also in verses 20, 22, and 23)

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho The [seed] δὲ <WG1161> de - ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τὰ <WG3588> ta - πετρώδη <WG4075> petrōdē rocky ground σπαρείς <WG4687> spareis sown οὗτός <WG3778> houtos - ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ὁ <WG3588> ho the [one who] τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon word ἀκούων <WG191> akouōn hears καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys at once μετὰ <WG3326> meta with χαρᾶς <WG5479> charas joy . λαμβάνων <WG2983> lambanōn receives αὐτόν <WG846> auton it

οὐκ <WG3756> ouk no ἔχει <WG2192> echei he has δὲ <WG1161> de since ῥίζαν <WG4491> rhizan root , ἐν <WG1722> en . . . ἑαυτῷ <WG1438> heautō . . . ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla But πρόσκαιρός <WG4340> proskairos for only a season . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin he remains γενομένης <WG1096> genomenēs comes δὲ <WG1161> de [When] θλίψεως <WG2347> thlipseōs trouble ἢ <WG2228> ē or διωγμοῦ <WG1375> diōgmou persecution διὰ <WG1223> dia because of τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon word , εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys vvv σκανδαλίζεται <WG4624> skandalizetai he quickly falls away .

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho The [seed] δὲ <WG1161> de - εἰς <WG1519> eis among τὰς <WG3588> tas the ἀκάνθας <WG173> akanthas thorns σπαρείς <WG4687> spareis sown οὗτός <WG3778> houtos - ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ὁ <WG3588> ho the [one who] τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon word , ἀκούων <WG191> akouōn hears καὶ <WG2532> kai but ἡ <WG3588> hē the μέριμνα <WG3308> merimna worries τοῦ <WG3588> tou of αἰῶνος <WG165> aiōnos life ‹τούτου› <WG3778> toutou this καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē the ἀπάτη <WG539> apatē deceitfulness τοῦ <WG3588> tou - πλούτου <WG4149> ploutou of wealth συμπνίγει <WG4846> sympnigei choke τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon word , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἄκαρπος <WG175> akarpos unfruitful . γίνεται <WG1096> ginetai it becomes

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho the [seed] δὲ <WG1161> de But ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τὴν <WG3588> tēn - καλὴν <WG2570> kalēn good γῆν <WG1093> gēn soil σπαρείς <WG4687> spareis sown οὗτός <WG3778> houtos - ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ὁ <WG3588> ho the [one who] τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon word ἀκούων <WG191> akouōn hears καὶ <WG2532> kai [and] συνιείς <WG4920> synieis understands [it] . ὃς <WG3739> hos [He] δὴ <WG1211> dē indeed καρποφορεῖ <WG2592> karpophorei bears fruit καὶ <WG2532> kai and ποιεῖ <WG4160> poiei produces a crop — ὃ <WG3739> ho - μὲν <WG3303> men - ἑκατὸν <WG1540> hekaton a hundredfold , ὃ <WG3739> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - ἑξήκοντα <WG1835> hexēkonta sixtyfold , ὃ <WG3739> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de or τριάκοντα <WG5144> triakonta thirtyfold . ”

Ἄλλην <WG243> Allēn another παραβολὴν <WG3850> parabolēn parable ( The Parable of the Weeds) παρέθηκεν <WG3908> parethēken [Jesus] put before αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them λέγων <WG3004> legōn - : Ὡμοιώθη <WG3666> Hōmoiōthē is like ἡ <WG3588> hē “ The βασιλεία <WG932> basileia kingdom τῶν <WG3588> tōn of οὐρανῶν <WG3772> ouranōn heaven ἀνθρώπῳ <WG444> anthrōpō a man σπείραντι <WG4687> speiranti who sowed καλὸν <WG2570> kalon good σπέρμα <WG4690> sperma seed ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - ἀγρῷ <WG68> agrō field . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his

ἐν <WG1722> en while δὲ <WG1161> de But τῷ <WG3588> tō . . . καθεύδειν <WG2518> katheudein was asleep , τοὺς <WG3588> tous vvv ἀνθρώπους <WG444> anthrōpous everyone ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen came αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἐχθρὸς <WG2190> echthros enemy καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπέσπειρεν <WG4687> epespeiren sowed ζιζάνια <WG2215> zizania weeds ἀνὰ <WG303> ana among μέσον <WG3319> meson . . . τοῦ <WG3588> tou the σίτου <WG4621> sitou wheat , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀπῆλθεν <WG565> apēlthen slipped away .

ὅτε <WG3753> hote When δὲ <WG1161> de - ἐβλάστησεν <WG985> eblastēsen sprouted ὁ <WG3588> ho the χόρτος <WG5528> chortos wheat καὶ <WG2532> kai and καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon grain , ἐποίησεν <WG4160> epoiēsen bore τότε <WG5119> tote then ἐφάνη <WG5316> ephanē appeared . καὶ <WG2532> kai also τὰ <WG3588> ta the ζιζάνια <WG2215> zizania weeds

Προσελθόντες <WG4334> Proselthontes came δὲ <WG1161> de - οἱ <WG3588> hoi The δοῦλοι <WG1401> douloi servants τοῦ <WG3588> tou vvv οἰκοδεσπότου <WG3617> oikodespotou owner’s εἶπον <WG2036> eipon [and] said , αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to him Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie ‘ Sir , οὐχὶ <WG3780> ouchi vvv καλὸν <WG2570> kalon good σπέρμα <WG4690> sperma seed ἔσπειρας <WG4687> espeiras didn’t you sow ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - σῷ <WG4674> sō your ἀγρῷ <WG68> agrō field ? πόθεν <WG4159> pothen Where οὖν <WG3767> oun then ἔχει <WG2192> echei did ζιζάνια <WG2215> zizania [the] weeds come from ? ’

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - ἔφη <WG5346> ephē he replied αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois - . Ἐχθρὸς <WG2190> Echthros ‘ An enemy ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos . . . τοῦτο <WG3778> touto this , ’ ἐποίησεν <WG4160> epoiēsen did Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi - δὲ <WG1161> de [So] δοῦλοι <WG1401> douloi [the] servants αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him , λέγουσιν <WG3004> legousin asked Θέλεις <WG2309> Theleis Do you want οὖν <WG3767> oun ‘ - ἀπελθόντες <WG565> apelthontes us to go [and] συλλέξωμεν <WG4816> syllexōmen pull them up αὐτά <WG846> auta . . . ? ’
